# cameraZoomRange

**Interface Property**

Values that set the minimum and maximum distances of the camera from the map center.

## Declaration

```swift
cameraZoomRange?: CameraZoomRange;
```

## Discussion

Set this property with a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRange] instance, which is an object containing [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRange/minCameraDistance] and [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRange/maxCameraDistance] properties.
title: cameraZoomRange
